knimeNode.name: Gaussian Process Regression Predictor
knimeNode.shortDescription: Predicts the response using a gaussian process regression model.

fullDescription.intro: Predicts the response using a gaussian process regression model. The node needs to be connected to a gaussian process regression node model and some test data. It is only executable if the test data contains the columns that are used by the learner model. This node appends a new columns to the input table containing the prediction for each row.

ports.inPort: Table for prediction. Missing values will give missing values in the output.
ports.outPort: Table from input with an additional prediction and variance column.
